notesStmt.note: Verses are divided by a space; sporadic vocalization. After the lead verse רדי עיני רוב דמעה, the alphabetized strophes start אכף ראש וגם קומה. The rest of the folio contains the first 16 strophes (א-ע), constructed of three rhyming verses, and a fourth that rhymes עה-. Damaged, loss along internal edge.
